trans-unit.source: Represents a JScript method.
trans-unit.target: 表示 JScript 方法。

trans-unit.source: This class belongs to the name binding category.
trans-unit.target: 此类属于名称绑定类别。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object for the method on the direct or indirect base class in which this method was first declared.
trans-unit.target: 对于直接或间接基类上的方法，返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象，在直接或间接基类中，此方法是最先声明的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="this" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="this" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this method.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组，其中包含附加到此方法的自定义特性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则搜索此成员的继承层次结构以查找特性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this method.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组，其中包含附加到此方法的自定义特性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Object" /> objects that has zero elements.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 对象数组，该数组包含零个元素。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则搜索此成员的继承层次结构以查找特性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this method, searching only for attributes of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组，其中包含附加到此方法的自定义特性（只搜索指定类型的特性）。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Object" /> objects that has zero elements.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 对象数组，该数组包含零个元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关此方法的实现的信息。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.Managed" /> and <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.IL" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.Managed" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.IL" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to call the method on.
trans-unit.target: 要对其调用方法的对象。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control the binding.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值的按位组合，这些值控制绑定。

trans-unit.source: An object that converts the type from actual argument type to formal argument type.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，该对象可将类型从实参类型转换为形参类型。

trans-unit.source: The argument list to pass to the method.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给方法的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: Provides information about a specific culture or locale.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关特定区域性或区域设置的信息。

trans-unit.source: Used to format numbers, dates, and strings correctly.
trans-unit.target: 用于正确设置数字、日期和字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the method, using the specified information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的信息调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the call to the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法调用的返回值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute type to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的特性类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则搜索此成员的继承层次结构以查找特性。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified attribute type is attached to this method.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的特性类型是否附加到此方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of member that this method is.
trans-unit.target: 获取此方法所充当成员的类型。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the type of class derived from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> that this class derives from.
trans-unit.target: 标识派生自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" />（此类从中派生）的类的类型。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MemberTypes.Method" />, because this class derives from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 由于此类派生自 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MemberTypes.Method" />，因此为 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a handle to the internal metadata representation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 获取此方法的内部元数据表示形式的句柄。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the internal metadata representation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的内部元数据表示形式的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 通过反射获取用于获取此实例的类对象。

trans-unit.source: The type that declares this method.
trans-unit.target: 声明此方法的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the custom attributes for the type of the return value of this method.
trans-unit.target: 获取此方法返回值的类型的自定义特性。

trans-unit.source: null in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 null。
